text: Lalle ne haƙiƙa Allah Ya gaskata wa ManzonSa mafarkinsa da gaskiya: Lalle za ku shiga Masallacin Harami, in Allah Ya so, kuna masu natsuwa, masu aske kawunanku da masu suisuye, ba ku jin tsoro, domin (Allah) Ya san abin da ba ku sani ba, sa'an nan Ya sanya wani cin nasara makusanci a bayan wannan
